node.text:
That combination of breakfast & lunch is a natural winner and if you are a brunch enthusiast who lives for bottomless mimosas and eggs Benedict, then the Sunday Brunch spread at The Raviz Kovalam is not to be missed.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220 
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
